data.title: Expert Data & AI Consultancy
data.meta_description: Unlock the potential of Data & AI with Telefónica Tech's trusted consultancy. From building a data-fluent culture to harnessing responsible AI, discover how our solutions accelerate platform delivery and drive value.
data.text:
Harness the full potential of your organisation’s data with our committed Data & AI consultancy. We understand the challenges of data ownership, decentralised information and lack of education on the impact of data accuracy. By leveraging our technical and strategic expertise, we help you unlock the power of Data & AI to drive business growth and innovation. Our tailored frameworks enhance data integrity, streamline information delivery and build trust in your data. Let us empower your organisation to make data-driven decisions that lead to sustainable success.

Our team offers professional services specialising in advanced data analytics, from data management strategy and consultancy through to world-class delivery and managed services. As a certified Microsoft Azure Infrastructure and Data and AI Solutions Partner with advanced Specialisation in Analytics, we are equipped to guide you every step of your Data & AI journey.

At Telefónica Tech, we think that it is important to start with the end in mind. Today’s organisational and data landscapes are complex and trying to bring about true business transformation can be challenging. While it is tempting to view technology as a silver bullet, jumping headlong into something new can be confusing, risky, and costly.

To help customers navigate these types of challenges, we provide a range of advisory services. These services will help you understand where your organisation is, where it needs to go, and how to get there.

Our advisory services deliver valuable, practical and, most importantly, actionable guidance to help your organisation make the most out of its important data assets.

We offer a range of accelerate services that package our knowledge and experience of developing and operating cloud and data analytics solutions, to reduce your time to deployment and gaining insight from your data.

These services are a perfect way to jump-start your initiative by providing proven templated approaches with alignment to standards including the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure.

Our full SaaS offerings such as the Data Lake Ingestion service will take you further faster. As one-click provisioned services, they only require simple management through a web front-end and are backed by an Telefónica Tech managed service.

Delivering outstanding solutions to our customers is the core of Telefónica Tech. We combine business knowledge with advanced technology and architecture skills, alongside project management and business change capabilities to deliver a range of services and solutions that enable you to get more value from the data within your organisation.

We help our customer make better informed business decisions by designing and delivering enterprise data management and decision-making capabilities. We bring innovation and insight to help our customers transform large volumes of data into meaningful information that lets them act smarter, move quicker and grow faster.

From data migration & application integration to modern data warehouses to enterprise business intelligence solutions, through to Power BI and data science & AI solutions, Telefónica Tech are able to help you wherever they are on your data transformation journey.

Let our experts operate, optimise and evolve your cloud, data and AI platform – allowing you to focus on your business.

Our managed service is tailored to provide an operation that will seamlessly link in with your data & analytics development cycle, whether delivered internally or by an external partner. Meaning that you can focus on forging data analytics ahead in your organisation. While Telefónica Tech Managed Services ensure the production service is operating efficiently and securely, and enabling business value.We’ll continuously work to boost efficiency, reduce costs, introduce new tools, and sharpen your analysis.

An evolving data and AI platform, delivered as a service

Kept at peak efficiency by data experts using proven Microsoft solutions

Regularly optimised through model re-training and feature updates

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is not new, but never before has it had such an impact on the way we live and work. We partner with many organisations at different levels of AI maturity, to design solutions that enable them to responsibly adopt AI for use-cases that make a valuable impact on their organisation.

We have subject matter expertise building, managing, and deploying AI solutions that leverage Azure AI services such as Azure OpenAI and Copilot, as well as data science and machine learning.
